about_the_game:
Bar Night VR puts you in the shoes of a virtual bartender, where the hustle never stops! Manage your underground bar, serving customers, restocking drinks, filling machines, and keeping the night alive. As you progress through each shift, you’ll face new challenges and master the art of being a bartender.

Start by serving simple drinks, then work your way up to crafting complex cocktails—all while ensuring your bar stays in control and the vibes stay fun!

  • Serve up drinks and learn new bartending skills

  • Keep the peace and prevent bar brawls

  • Cater to all kinds of customers, from everyday patrons to the more... mysterious types

  • And most importantly, keep yourself sober!

Get ready to mix, serve, restock, and repeat—because in Bar Night VR, the party never ends!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel i5 10th or superior
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia GTX 1660 Ti
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • VR Support: Quest 2, Quest 3
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Mix. Serve. Restock. Fill. Repeat. Bar Night VR is a VR bartender experience where you manage a bar, being responsible for serving customers, restocking drinks, filling machines, and more. Progress through the nights and master the bartender experience!
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, Traditional Chinese, Japanese, Portuguese - Brazil
